Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is more responsive in general and I'm able to get feedback in a very short time although the feedback may not be as accurate and reasonable as that from my teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will be more likely to generate the answers that make you feel better and a teacher's feedback would be more precise and reasonable.
